This is a registration form. It adds new items (**Cases**) to track. You can save some or all of the questions in this form to the case as **case properties**, which means you can refer to them in later forms, display them on the phone as a record, or use them to distinguish among cases.
Add questions to this form using the toolbar above:
* You can add text, number, multiple choice, or other question types. * For multiple and single choice questions, use the circle button in the toolbar to add more choices. * For a given question, set the Question ID to the name of your data variable and the Label to the text you want the user to see.
On the main form settings page, you can choose which of these questions you want to *save to the case* as case properties.
For more help, see the following Help Site Pages:
* [CommCare Forms](https://confluence.dimagi.com/display/commcarepublic/Form+Builder) * [Case Management Overview](https://confluence.dimagi.com/display/commcarepublic/Case+Management). * [Application Building Tutorials](https://confluence.dimagi.com/display/commcarepublic/Application+Building+Tutorial+Series)
When you're ready to test your form, you can use the Try In CloudCare option on the main form page, or [install it on a phone using our deploy manager](https://confluence.dimagi.com/display/commcarepublic/Deploy+an+Application+on+CommCareHQ).
